message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  I'm interested in the product but my budget is a bit tighter than that. I'm willing to pay $105 for it. What do you think?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand that you're looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $108.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $108 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm really close to my budget limit. Would you be willing to come down to $106?  That would be a fair price for both of us.
I understand that you're really close to your budget limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $107.
